title: localmap Overview
format: html
---

Welcome to localmap, the species occurrence mapping compendium.

- Environment: `renv`
- Pipeline: `{targets}`
- Tests: `{testthat}`
- Docs: Quarto (`docs/` and `reports/`)
- Species data sourced with `{galah}` from the Atlas of Living Australia

Quick links:

- Pipeline overview: `docs/PIPELINE.md`
- Development notes: `docs/DEVELOPMENT.qmd`
- Report: `reports/paper.qmd`
- Species requests: `metadata/species_requests.csv`

Run locally (RStudio Console):

```r
renv::restore(prompt = FALSE)
source("dependencies.R")
pak::pkg_install(project_dependencies())
targets::tar_make()
```
